title: Bloomberg Markets: Sassower Sees Demand for EM Credit
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Sassower Sees Demand for EM Credit
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Damian Sassower Fixed Income Strategist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing new issuance due to red hot demand for emerging market USD debtmarkets. Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
